fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Hide another people within the depths, making all attacks against them fail.
- Submerge yourself in water for the night, making all attacks against you fail. (1 use)

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value: - You have Basic Defense and Detection Immunity

fields.name: Upgrade:
fields.value:
- After being Upgraded, the next attack against you will automatically fail.
- As the factional attacker, you will force your target's abilities to fail if they die.
